滿載而歸/满载而归 | Pick (1/2/3/4)
1. To return home home fully laden with riches, gifts, etc.

2. Not as much as those above, but more than those below.

3. A man's worth cannot be judged by his looks

4. All people within the four seas can become (as close) as your older and younger brothers.
